ERROR_CODES.INPUT_MISSING: Required input file does not exist
ERROR_CODES.INPUT_INVALID: Input file exists but content is invalid or unusable
ERROR_CODES.SCHEMA_VIOLATION: Output file fails JSON Schema validation
ERROR_CODES.EXTERNAL_FAILURE: External service or API failure outside agent control
ERROR_CODES.INTERNAL_ERROR: Unexpected internal error in agent logic
ERROR_CODES.CANCELLED: Operation was cancelled by user or system
